EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case #: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Thank you for reaching out! We have received your email and a customer adviser will follow up with you as soon as possible to resolve your inquiry so you can get back to business.
Answering questions are a top priority for us. If your issue can’t wait, our customer advisers are here to help 24 hours a day at 1-888-531-3698.
In the meantime, you may refer to our resource page for everything you need to know about your Chevron and Texaco Business Card Program.
Tutorial for using our online account management system Going paperless Finding current balance or available credit on your account Driver instructions Reporting and spending controls And much more…
Access your Chevron and Texaco Business Card account on-the-go with our mobile app SmartHub.
Download at the iPhone App Store or for Android users on Google Play. You can also download at www.fleetsmarthub.com.
Best Regards,
Chevron and Texaco Business Card Program Correspondence Team
